## isMap() function

Determines whether an input is a map or not.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isMap<T>(value: T): value is T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | T | input |

<b>Returns:</b>

value is T

true if the input is a map, false otherwise.

## Example


```ts
 isMap(new Map<string, number>()) // true
 isMap({ id: 1 })                 // false
 isMap([1, 2, 3])                 // false
```
